label: NPR1 low & JAZ low
description: Low NPR1 activity, low JAZ activity

label: rx00432transcriptional/translational repression
evidence sentence: SA-induced NPR1 is recruited to JA-responsive promoter regions that are co-occupied by a JA-induced transcription complex consisting of the MYC2 activator and MED25 Mediator subunit. In the presence of SA, NPR1 physically associates with JA-induced MYC2 and inhibits transcriptional activation by disrupting its interaction with MED25. In the absence of JA, JAZ cofactors competitively inhibit transcription activators of JA-responsive genes, including the basic-helix-loop-helix (bHLH) transcription factors MYC2, MYC3, and MYC4, by preventing their interaction with the MED25 subunit of the Mediator complex.

label: MYC2
synonyms: BHLH6, EN38, JAI1, JIN1, MYC2, RAP1, RD22BP1, ZBF1

label: LOX
synonyms: LOX4, ATLOX3, LOX6, LOX1, ATLOX1, LOX5, ATLOX4, LOX2, LOX3, ATLOX2, ATLOX6'
